issue.title: [Plasma] Use Scope enum in Plasma
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2758](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2758). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Modernize our usage of enums in plasma:
1. add option "--scoped-enum" to Flat Buffer Compiler.
1. change the old-styled c++ enum to c++11 style.
